response.original_title: Boss Me Around If You Dare
response.overview: Just after she is falsely accused of sleeping with her boss and fired, Olivia lands a new job at Wilder Conglomerate—only to realize her new boss is Theo Wilder, the man she hooked up with last night! Olivia says they can’t work together, but Theo challenges her to stay and take a bet: he says he can make her fall for him, while Olivia bets she can resist his seduction… but just how long can she last against her boss’ sexy advances?
response.title: Boss Me Around If You Dare
